Detailed Description

template<class T>
class LoaderTypeSelector< T >

Class that selects the correct loader/saver for values.

Definition at line 128 of file ItemComboLoader.h.

Member Typedef Documentation

template<class T>
typedef ItemComboLoader< typename STLUtility::IfThenElse< IsDataBufferRW , DataBufferRW , typename STLUtility::IfThenElse< IsPacketRW , PacketRW , T >::ResultT >::ResultT > LoaderTypeSelector< T >::loaderType
 

Find the loader type.

If the type T is derived from DataBufferRW, we should select the DataBufferRW class as loaderType, if T is derived from PacketRW the PacketRW type should be selected. If T is derived form neither of these types, T itself should be selected.

Definition at line 144 of file ItemComboLoader.h.

template<class T>
anonymous enum
 

See if the type T is DataBufferRW and/or PacketRW.

Enumeration values:
IsDataBufferRW 
IsPacketRW  T is derived from DataBufferRW.
IsNeither  T is derived from PacketRW.
